top_comments.comment:
The thing I loved about Harry's version is how weary it is, you know? like he was feeling the end of that relationship, JK's has a different resonance to it, less weary and more confused. Harry's is more resigned to the end of the relationship, JK's isn't.

Well, that's how their voices make me feel.  

Both versions are great and they both have excellent technique.
do ed sheeran equals reaction plsss

comments_since_last_sample.body: Jungkook's voice is so calming and angelic. His vocals was a perfect match for this song. This was such an incredible cover!!
I love Jungkook and your reaction but I was distracted the whole time by that adorable kitty 😭😍

The thing I loved about Harry's version is how weary it is, you know? like he was feeling the end of that relationship, JK's has a different resonance to it, less weary and more confused. Harry's is more resigned to the end of the relationship, JK's isn't.

Well, that's how their voices make me feel.  

Both versions are great and they both have excellent technique.
Off subject: but Motley (sp) is soooooo cute...he watches your hands when you are talking...so cute!!
